arts.ttl: Port Vale 0-0 Cardiff: Wasteful Vale held as Bluebirds ride their luck
arts.sum: Curtis thought he had finally put Vale ahead three minutes into the second half with a calm finish beyond Trott, but the offside flag denied him. A disallowed goal early in the second half was the closest the home side came to breaking the deadlock, but ultimately they were left to reflect on a missed opportunity against a Cardiff side that struggled to impose themselves in key areas.

arts.ttl: Port Vale vs Cardiff - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's League One clash between Port Vale and Cardiff City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
